concept.definition: A type of packaging in which a medication is sealed in plastic, often with a cardboard backing.
A box or tray that organizes mediations into separate compartments
A small packet that contains medication for individual use.

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medication-dose-aid defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
blisterpack Blister PackA type of packaging in which a medication is sealed in plastic, often with a cardboard backing.
dosette DosetteA box or tray that organizes mediations into separate compartments
sachets SachetsA small packet that contains medication for individual use.
